name: meknow
description: Meknow - E-commerce Express.js API + Next.js Frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n api,web -c yellow,cyan "node backend-minimal.js" "npm --prefix menow-web run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n api,web -c yellow,cyan "node backend-minimal.js" "npm --prefix menow-web run start"
scripts.db:reset: psql -h localhost -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS meknow_production; CREATE DATABASE meknow_production;' && npm run db:init

author: Yassineco
